summary: Core navigation (home/game/summary), game loop, random question selection, and a playful theme are implemented. However, per-category backend progress tracking is not implemented, backend question bank is insufficient for 10-question rounds, and the required generated image assets are not present in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend question bank for Letters, Numbers, and Colors must have enough questions to support at least one 10-question round per category, with age-appropriate prompts and 3‚Äì4 answer choices.
missing_requirements.reason: The backend question map contains only 3 total questions (one per category), which cannot support a 10-question round per category. Also, backend questions only include 1‚Äì2 acceptable answers rather than 3‚Äì4 multiple-choice options.

missing_requirements.requirement: Persist progress per category (best score and total rounds played) on the backend keyed by principal and display it per category on the home/progress view.
missing_requirements.reason: Backend stores a single Progress record per Principal (not per category). Although updateProgress accepts a category argument, it is not used to track separate progress per category. The HomeScreen displays only one overall best score and rounds played, not per category.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the required generated static images under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them in the UI (mascot, background, and category icons).
missing_requirements.reason: UI references image paths under /assets/generated, but the diff does not include the actual image files under frontend/public/assets/generated.
